pr_title: MINOR: Use .asf.yaml to direct github notifications to JIRA and mailing lists

timeline.message: MINOR: Use .asf.yaml to direct github notifications to JIRA and mailing lists

timeline.bodyText: Do we have this mailing list already?
timeline.author: ijuma
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one

+# KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+# specific language governing permissions and limitations
+# under the License.
+
+notifications:
+  commits:      commits@kafka.apache.org
+  issues:       github@kafka.apache.org
+  pullrequests: github@kafka.apache.org

replies.bodyText:
Good Question. I think, we dont have ``github@kafka.apache.org` yet.
Only ASF members and PMC Chair can create mailing list using : https://selfserve.apache.org/
Maybe we can request @junrao to create a new mailing address : github@kafka.apache.org
replies.author: omkreddy

replies.bodyText: Can we use the commits mailing list for now?
replies.author: ijuma

replies.bodyText: Btw, we have a JIRA mailing list, maybe we can use that for issues and pull requests for now.
replies.author: ijuma

replies.bodyText:
sounds good. we can use jira@afka.apache.org. If required, we can change later.
updated the PR.
replies.author: omkreddy
